title: The Virgin Mary and Jesus Christ appeared to Veronica Lueken over a period of 25 years during her Rosary...

attachments.displayName:
The Virgin Mary and Jesus Christ appeared to Veronica Lueken over a period of 25 years during her Rosary vigils in Flushing Meadows Park, NY.

The Blessed Virgin warned that unless we return to traditional morals,  World War III and a great comet will kill billions of people "within this century, if not sooner."

Since the event did not come to pass in the 20th century, then perhaps we have rehabilitated sufficiently for Divine purposes, and catastrophe has been averted, but more likely it has merely been postponed. Our Lady has been appointed by God to warn humanity that there will be a cleansing by fire unless we repent and correct our ways. The chastisement will be preceded by a worldwide Warning, and that will be followed by a great Miracle. If mankind still refuses to change, then God will punish us.

On April 21, 1973, Veronica Leuken received a Warning while in she was in ecstasy:
"It's as though everything has exploded in the sky. There is a great flash! Then it's very hot - very warm - and it feels like you're burning. There is a huge explosion, and the sky becomes very white. . .and then there are colors - blues, purples. . . It 's like a huge explosion. Now this voice -- the voice ...! And the voice, Our Lady says, is a voice within you: "Your warning before the Chastisement! Flash, fire, and the voice within you! The final Warning before Chastisement.
"Man will feel that the very powers of the elements have shaken the very foundations of his being. So great will be the impact of this Warning from the Father that none will doubt that it had come from the Father. . .It will be a major awakening to many. The rumbling and the shaking of the elements will set fright into many hearts. . .Hearts will shudder with fear and men will drop from fright... Many signs of an angry God will appear before you. . ."
On June 12, 1976, the Blessed Virgin Mary told Mrs. Lueken that the Warning was close at hand:
"My child, you must pray more: do much penance. For the Warning is coming upon mankind. There will be a tremendous explosion and the sky shall roll back like a scroll, this force shall go within the very core of the human. He will understand his offenses to his God. However, this Warning will be of short duration. and many shall continue upon their road to perdition, so hard are the hearts hardened now, My child."
"The Eternal Father will send a Warning to mankind, a great Warning of such magnitude that very few will doubt that it comes from the Eternal Father and is not man-made." (July 25, 1978)

you can read more at - http://www.rexresearch.com/prophist/phf4mary.htm#lueken


A "Miraculous Photo" from Flushing Meadows:
The Virgin Surrounded by Rosaries (December 31, 1999)

object.content:
The Virgin Mary and Jesus Christ appeared to Veronica Lueken over a period of 25 years during her Rosary vigils in Flushing Meadows Park, NY.
  
The Blessed Virgin warned that unless we return to traditional morals,  World War III and a great comet will kill billions of people "within this century, if not sooner."
  
Since the event did not come to pass in the 20th century, then perhaps we have rehabilitated sufficiently for Divine purposes, and catastrophe has been averted, but more likely it has merely been postponed. Our Lady has been appointed by God to warn humanity that there will be a cleansing by fire unless we repent and correct our ways. The chastisement will be preceded by a worldwide Warning, and that will be followed by a great Miracle. If mankind still refuses to change, then God will punish us.
  
On April 21, 1973, Veronica Leuken received a Warning while in she was in ecstasy:
"It's as though everything has exploded in the sky. There is a great flash! Then it's very hot - very warm - and it feels like you're burning. There is a huge explosion, and the sky becomes very white. . .and then there are colors - blues, purples. . . It 's like a huge explosion. Now this voice -- the voice ...! And the voice, Our Lady says, is a voice within you: "Your warning before the Chastisement! Flash, fire, and the voice within you! The final Warning before Chastisement.
"Man will feel that the very powers of the elements have shaken the very foundations of his being. The rumbling and the shaking of the elements will set fright into many hearts. . .Hearts will shudder with fear and men will drop from fright... Many signs of an angry God will appear before you. . ."
On June 12, 1976, the Blessed Virgin Mary told Mrs. Lueken that the Warning was close at hand:
"My child, you must pray more: do much penance. For the Warning is coming upon mankind. There will be a tremendous explosion and the sky shall roll back like a scroll, this force shall go within the very core of the human. He will understand his offenses to his God. However, this Warning will be of short duration. and many shall continue upon their road to perdition, so hard are the hearts hardened now, My child."
"The Eternal Father will send a Warning to mankind, a great Warning of such magnitude that very few will doubt that it comes from the Eternal Father and is not man-made." (July 25, 1978)

+Charles De Vita Here is where the true story came from: Joey Lomangino

http://whatisgarabandal.blogspot.com/2009/07/prophecies-of-garabandal-ix.html  

http://www.garabandal.org/story.shtml

Please look at both sites! If you want the truth! Veronica Leuken Took the story from Joey Lomangino and the four Girls from the 1960s!... St Padre Pio was a believer and was aware of this at the time it was taking place in the 60s...

+Kim A Consiglio  I looked through the material at these links and didn't notice the reference you are making - do you know exactly where it is? Are you saying that this photograph was taken in the 1960's?  Are you saying Veronica is a fake? Padre Pio was aware of what Kim? Please explain further

If you take the time and read Conchita story she will tell you everything that is to come,and watch her speak about the Warning/Miracle/ Chastisement The Events of Garabandal 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCDDtD-mZYk/.... she will explain everything! St Pio was aware of Garabandal and believe blessed Mother was appearing there!  I've been following this for years! The Photograph you showed was from the time of Veronica Leuken time and has been many photos during her time with the people...However all she says in the way of The warning miracle chastisement comes from the girls from Garabandal....If anyone wants to believe in this lady it is up to that person. Charles take a look at other videos Conchita made and speaks about all that's to come from God.  God bless....

+Kim A Consiglio  Blessed Mother has repeated the same warning to different people - right now I can show you 3 or 4 people who say that she is giving them messages - and these message are very similar - now that either means that one person is taking another person's message and changing it slightly and saying Blessed Mother gave them this message - or she is giving similar messages to different people [these people live in different countries and so the language is different]

There is only so much Blessed Mother can say - she speaks of recognizing and asking forgiveness of your sins - to change you sinful behavior - and if people don't do this they will reap the consequences of their sin because Father will chastise His children

So, the question is - is Veronica a fake - just repeating a message and saying Blessed Mother gave it to her - or did Blessed Mother give her a similar message many years later.

Just because several people receive similar messages of warning and what is to come doesn't necessarily mean that they are true or not true.

I don't think it is fair for me to judge Veronica - how would I know?

Veronica may be a fake or not - I don't know - the reason I posted this is it's similar to many messages I have posted over the years and as far as I am concerned speaks to what is to come in the near future [ and honestly I thought the picture was very interesting !!!]

Charles yes many sound the same and for me I have Medjugorje/Garabandal for me I believe very much. Many Charles don't believe in ether and that course is up to that person... Yes the photo is very interesting. I myself post twice a month the messages give to the visionaries from blessed mother to us from Medjugorje and I have come across many who do not believe in Medjugorje at all and its sad because Charles she is appearing and blessed mother Mary is trying to call us all back to her son back to prayer! As for Veronica this lady took a lot of money from many people some who lost everything to her, all I ask is we all have to use discretion/discernment....God bless you!
